Hidden Love Interest Mode.Description: The intended experience. Makes marrying the Wizard impossible until conditions are met. Please reference the mod page for details. Adds additional events and in-world context to events.	Important: TOGGLING THIS IN THE MIDDLE OF A PLAYTHROUGH MAY CAUSE BUGS AND PREVENT SOME EVENTS FROM TRIGGERING.

Override Generic Dialogue.Description: Overrides generic universal dialogue. Please disable this if you aren't planning to date the Wizard.

Sprite.Description: Please leave this on default if you would like to use the included sprite that matches the portrait. If you have a custom Wizard sprite you would like to use, change this to custom.

Wizard Babies.Description: Turn this on if you would like the included wizard baby sprites. Only really makes sense for biological children. For adopted children, I would suggest turning this off.

Wizard Age Appearance.Description: Changes some dialogue that refers to the Wizard's appearance. He will still be very old.

Earring Colour.Description: Changes the colour of Magnus' eventual earring gift in the event. Please pick which suit you better. To actually wear them in game, please install the Fashion sense pack.

Baby Skin Colour.Description: Changes the skin colour of children in events. Only used for events so the correct sprite is called. The rest is handled automatically by the game. Only applies to biological children events currently. Only use this if you AREN'T using custom sprites.

Birthday Season.Description: What season the player's birthday is in. Used for events. Please do not set it on a festival day if you don't want bugs. For compatibility with the happy birthday mod, please read the mod page for more information.

Birthday Day.Description: What day the player's birthday is on. Used for events. Please do not set it on a festival day if you don't want bugs. For compatibility with the happy birthday mod, please read the Nexus page for more information.

Wedding Season.Description: What season wedding took place in. Used for events. Please do not set it on a festival day if you don't want bugs. I generally don't suggest getting married on the 1st of a season because it may cause some bugs.

Wedding Day.Description: What day the wedding took place on. Used for events. Please do not set it on a festival day if you don't want bugs.I generally don't suggest getting married on the 1st of a season because it may cause some bugs.

Date Ask Percent Chance.Description: Configure the chance Magnus will ask you to go on a date upon leaving the farmhouse each day after marriage. Default is 25%, but can be any percent 0-100. Set to 0 to disable the date event.

Min Hearts Required.Description: Change the minimum number of hearts required with Magnus for him to ask you on a date. Default is 10 hearts.

Friendship Bonus.Description: Change the amount of friendship received with Magnus if you go on a date with him. 'none' will disable any friendship bonuses, 'small' will increase friendship by 25 points (1/10 of a heart), 'medium' increases by 50 points (2/10 of a heart), and large increases by 100 points (4/10 of a heart).

Dates On Festival Days.Description: Enable/Disable being asked on a date on a festival day. Usually many areas are closed or off-limits on festival days, making it impossible for you to complete the date if asked. Enabling this will allow dates to be asked on a date with a festival, even if you won't be able to complete it. When disabled, dates will never be asked on every festival day (except the Night Market). Works on every vanilla festival and the two new Ridegside Village festivals.

Spicier Content.Description: Enables the most spicy of content. Nothing very explicit, but there are *a lot* of implications. Things are still somewhat suggestive when the command is off, but only to the level of existing SVE events such as Lance 10 heart.

Entries.winter_14: Hmm? How long is a wizard's lifespan?#$b#Ahh, are you still thinking of the conversation we had yesterday?$9#$b#Frankly, I do not know.$3#$b#Is it odd to not know one's lifespan?#$b#The truth of the matter is that it varies between each magic practitioner and their field of expertise.$3#$b#Mine in particular has afforded me to be what I'd suspect to be near limitless, as unlikely as that sounds.$3#$b#I will be honest with you, @, I did not expect to last this long, and sometimes I wonder what I've done right.$3#$b#Many people who lead this life give in to temptation, go too far, or simply lose the will to continue living as my Master did. It amazes me that I have not.$3#$e#Perhaps, my ex-wife was correct about my personality in some regard.$3#$b#No matter how dire, I find myself still able to maintain relative rationality through whatever fate has decided to rain upon me.$3#$b#The day I am cut loose...$3#$b#...Not even I could predict the result, but I imagine it could be quite the problem for the Ministry.$3#$e#Why do some practitioner look old if I'm as I am after nearly a millennium?#$b#Some of it I'm sure is simply preference, but often those that deal with more simplistic charms have a constitution closer to that of mortals.$3#$b#A general rule is that more powerful the magic the user, the longer their lives tend to be when excluding outstanding circumstances.$3#$e#Does that mean I'm a particularly powerful wizard?#$b#I would not have been put in charge of protecting the valley if I wasn't.$1#$b#Even if I fall short when it comes to raw power in my current state, I am far more experienced at finessing together solutions compared to my younger colleagues.$9
Entries.winter_15: ...I wish I could reveal my true name to you, @. In truth, I just don't remember it.$6#$b#Was it Carl? Or Hank? Maybe John?$3#$b#I think it was a good name. Entries.winter_17: What? Entries.winter_4: We had similar interests, my ex-wife and I. We would spend hours in each other's arms, reading forbidden books.$3##$b#I proposed to her under the full summer moon.$3##$b#It was...enchanting.$2#$b#That was a very long time ago.$3#$b#In the end, what we couldn't decide on was how to live, our ideals clashing at every turn. $3#$e#I'm afraid to admit just how much time I'd trapped myself in clinging to those brighter days prior to the last year spent with you, @.$2#$b#As presumptuous as it is to say, I feel like I failed her, @.$2#$b#I let things lapse, I avoided responsibility, and it cost me.#3#$b#The details will have to wait for another day, but I don't plan to repeat those failures.$3#$b#...Especially not after you've gone so far to accept me into your life.$9#$b#It is a dangerous compulsion to wonder about how things could have been.$3#$b#If I'd said things differently, if I'd been more understanding...$5#$b#Such thoughts can destroy a person.$3#$e#It's better to always do what you feel is right so you have no regrets. Doing what you feel is wrong, but doing it anyway, is madness.$5#$b#However, what is right is not always concrete nor simple.$3#$e#I hope you're never put in a similar situation.$3#$b#May those be the sole nuggets of wisdom you take from this sad old man's ramblings.$3

Utterly ridiculous! To think the townsfolk would rather believe this drivel than the astral plane!$5#$b#Frankly, I am somewhat insulted.$3#$b#Still, it was a good few hours spent sitting together with you.$1#$b#While the subject matter did us no favours, I greatly enjoyed holding hands the entire time.$4

...?$3#$b#I have many questions.#$b#Is the 'sapling' brave for leaving its familiar domain or for facing the storms?$3#$b#Was this species of creature unaware of the effect water would have on its head appendage?$3#$b#I find that rather difficult to believe.$3#$b#...It's simply a film targeted primarily children children...?$7#$b#Ah.$8#$b#*Ahem*. BeforeMovie.Text: I am told that this is an adaptation of a 'video game' that was originally adapted from the adventures of a real person.$3#$b#How does one 'adapt' a person's life into a movie, let alone a game that features videos?$3#$b#I assume much detail has been removed for the sake of brevity.

AfterMovie.Text: Ah, this is set on the western continent. I see.$3

...Is it called a 'western' because it is set on the western continent...?$3#$b#.....'Genre conventions'....?$5#$b#It is only now that I realise how narrow my scope of understanding truly is.$2#$b#Thank you for taking the time to broaden my world view, @.$1#$b#I must ask, however, are those 'water towers' featured in the film not a settlement's supply of water?$3#$b#I expect them to be rather important structures in arid areas....$3#$b#Ah, I see.#$b#I is one of those 'morally gray' films that I have heard of where the protagonist is as much a hero as villain, correct?#$b#....No...?$3#$b#Then I am even more confused.$2

BeforeMovie.Text: Ah, a film about nature.$1#$b#One boon of modern technology is the ability to capture and share images across time and distance.$9#$b#It has been long since I've traveled outside of the valley.$3#$b#Seeing the wider world through a screen is not ideal, but the lack of committment required on the participants is a great benefit.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Hmmm...$3

It was a rather shallow look, but an informative one to a degree.$3#$b#I hope that we will one day be able to visit more such places in person, my love.$1#$b#While the years I spent traveling were not my happiest, the unique sights certainly offered a reprieve from life's troubles.$9#$b#I can only imagine how wonderful it would be with you by my side.$6

I....$5#$b#...It was a comedy, you say?$3#$b#........$3#$b#?????$5#$b#I suspect that there may be significant context I am missing to understand the comedy within what I witnessed..$5#$b#...Would you be willing to explain it to me?$2#$b#...Potentially on the walk home...?$1#$b#...While holding hands?$6

BeforeMovie.Text: 'It' howls in the rain?$3#$b#If this is set in our world, 'it' would could be any manner of thing such as a shadow person surfacing, or some sort of monster from mines.$3#$b#I have also heard theories relating to aliens, but I have yet to see proof, personally.$3#$b#...Somehow I doubt this is the sort of film to be concerned with reality.$2

AfterMovie.Text: ...What did you say this style of film was?$3

...Frankly, I am at a loss for words.$3#$b#In what way was that film 'horror'?$5#$b#It appears I understand less of this era than even I intially believed.$2#$b#...Oh, it simply wasn't a very good horror film?$3#$b#Then perhaps there is some hope yet.$1#$b#...I was told that some couples purposefully watch horror films as an excuse to huddle together.$7#$b#...Do you want to 'huddle together', @?$6#$b#...Oh, it was supposed to be during the film?$2#$b#...I was too distracted by the ridiculous plot...$2

Entries.Wizard: Have a care not to miss any.#$b#The smell of rotting eggs attracts basilisks.$3
Last year the townsfolk neglected to care for some left behind eggs.#$b#Had it not been for me, the basilisks would've wrought havoc upon Pelican Town.

This ritual of egg-hunting makes little sense to me.#$b#Yet every year I come and marvel at the the bizarre excuses mundane folk concoct for an excuse to celebrate.$3#$e#Can't you just have a festival for the sake of it?$3#$b#No one is fooled.$0
Such senseless activity with such senseless results.#$b#Why hasn't this painful tradition, with such agonizing cleanup, faded over the generations already?
The egg, perhaps, symbolizes a rebirth.$3#$b#In spring, all things are born anew, are they not.$3#$e...$0#$e#I'm overthinking this, aren't I?$10

Perhaps, it is not the egg that drives their motivation to pursue this strange tradition.$3#$b#The egg hunt is specifically designed with children in mind, is it not? Entries.Wizard_wizardNap: Greetings @,^^I must apologize for the state in which you found me the other day. On occasion I find my sleep plagued with dark dreams and I, childishly, resort to avoiding my bed. It shames me to know you witnessed such behavior from me. Nevertheless, I would like to thank you for choosing to stay with me. With you nearby I slept soundly as I have not for several weeks.^If I can ever repay you, you have but to ask.^^ Sincerely,^ Magnus
Entries.Wizard_teachMagic: Greetings @,^^Many untold wonders are sheltered amongst the trees. Today, in particular, a strange energy stirs in the forest.^If you would like to learn heretofore unknown secrets, meet me in the hidden woods north of my tower.^^ Sincerely,^ Magnus
Entries.Pregnant1_Wizard: Greetings @,^^It has come to our attention that you and one of our founding members, Magnus Rasmodius has become blessed with child. We wish to offer you our sincere congratulations. We look forward to the day when you finally join our ranks.^^ Sincerely,^ The Ministry of Magic, Ferngill Republic Branch
Entries.Pregnant2_Wizard: Greetings @,^^It has come to our attention that you and Magnus have once again been blessed with child. We sincerely offer our congratulations at such a major milestone in your lives. We look forward to the day you and your children are able to join our ranks. ^^ Sincerely,^ The Ministry of Magic, Ferngill Republic Branch
Entries.Wizard_WeddingAnniversary: Dear @.^^Are you surprised? I slipped this letter into the mailbox early this morn before you awoke on a whim so pardon the informal nature of it.^^Call me old fashioned, but I've always enjoyed leaving tangible proof of something having existed. Consider this letter almost like a souvenir of the time: something to hold onto to remind us of the humble beginnings of our time together centuries in the future.^^ Even as you lay asleep within my arms I find myself at a loss for words at how to express even a fraction of how I feel.^^ To think another year has passed already! We have accomplished more in our brief time together than I have alone in countless human lifetimes.^^ Ironic, isn't it? So many mundane folk across the ages seek to grasp our immortality, yet it's only after embracing the mundane that I've found what it means to truly live. Never in the countless eras did I expect to find such beauty in a world that was all but dead in my eyes a mere few years ago.^^Perhaps a much younger man would have taken your presence for granted, but I as I am now wishes for nothing more than for these peaceful days to continue.^^I love you, @, now and forever.^-Magnus ^^^PS. Come back inside. I have another surprise for you.

Entries.1992704/f Wizard 2300/t 610 2600: WizardSong/7 19/farmer 8 24 0 Wizard 7 18 2/skippable/emote Wizard 32 true/move farmer 0 -6 3/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 200/speak Wizard "Ah, @. It is good to see you.$1#$b#Did you rest well? It was rather late when we left the night market last night...$2"/pause 500/stopMusic/emote farmer 40/pause 800/emote Wizard 40/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 800/emote Wizard 12/pause 600/speak Wizard "...I suppose I can't avoid the topic any longer, can I?$2"/pause 200/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Wizard "I...$5#$b#...First, allow me to apologize to you, for... everything.$2#$b#...The sudden glimmer and my strange behavior yesterday, how I keep insisting on keeping the relationship hidden from everyone around us...$3#$b#...Those were all attempts to shield you from prying eyes, @. $2#$b#......As clumsy as they were. $29"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/pause 400/speak Wizard "What prying eyes?$3#$b#...I spoke of it when we first began our relationship, did I not?$3#$b#The burdens of becoming entangled with one such as I.$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 12/pause 800/emote Wizard 40/pause 700/speak Wizard "...You are correct, @. I haven't exactly been forthright with the details.$2"/pause 200/faceDirection Wizard 2/pause 500/emote Wizard 28/pause 300/speak Wizard "...And you deserve the full truth...$2"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 1/pause 500/playMusic sadpiano/speak Wizard "Since the founding of the Ministry of Magic, us practitioners of the arts have been made to follow a doctrine.$3#$b#Said doctrine strictly regulates what sort of communications and interactions we can have with mortals.$3#$b#...Romantic relationships in particular are often frowned upon.$3"/pause 300/emote farmer 16/pause 400/emote farmer 8/pause 500/speak Wizard "Why?$3#$b#Part of it is on principle.$3#$b#We hold vast amounts of personal power that mortals are often ill-prepared to handle.$3#$b#More than once in history has a practitioner been turned into a weapon due to the grasp of another on their heart.$2#$b#It's part of why our reputation became so negative with mundane folk to begin with.$3"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Wizard "That's not the only outcome, of course, but no matter how great our partners may be, we must all deal with one eternal truth: time.$3"/pause 400/emote farmer 40/pause 400/speak Wizard "For those holding years stretching beyond centuries, the span of a single human lifetime amounts to very little.$3#$b#When faced with the demise of our mortal lovers, we are given a choice.$2#$b#Do we attempt to induct them to our world or accept the transient nature of life?$29"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "To practice magic is to bend reality around you.$3#$b#It's this warping of the natural world that affords our existence, but not all mortals hold the potential to practice magic.$3#$b# Even those that do often fail because their talent and dedication is insufficient.$2#$b#The reality is that if the Ministry hasn't taken notice of a mortal's potential before their adulthood, the chances of them successfully entering the magical world is low.$2#$b#...Not all of us are able to accept this reality...$29"/pause 500/emote farmer 60/pause 300/speak Wizard "...I've personally witnessed a dear friend perform horrible experiments just for the sake of extending her lover's life a few more years.$3#$b#...It was not a pretty sight, @.$2#$b#By the end of it all, we had to forcibly pull them apart for the sake of both their souls.$29"/pause 400/emote farmer 28/stopMusic/pause 500/speak Wizard "But that will not be our fate, @.$3"/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/positionOffset Wizard 1 0/pause 20/pause 500/playSound pickUpItem/showFrame Wizard 32/showframe farmer 89/pause 300/message "Magnus took my hands into his..."/pause 500/message "...His touch is nothing but tender and loving as he wraps my cold fingers in his warmth."/pause 400/playMusic junimoStarSong/speak Wizard "Can you feel it, @?$3#$b#That rhythm pulsing deep inside you?$1#$b#It was very faint when we first met but how it's grown in our short year together!$9#$b#That is your magical potential, @.$6"/pause 400/emote farmer 16/pause 500/speak Wizard "It took some time to finally blossom, but I believe it may far surpass mine when I was your age.$1#$b#...No doubt another one of fate's machinations...$3"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 400/speak Wizard "...But that does not matter.$3#$b#What's important is what this potential signifies.$1#$b#There is nothing stopping you from joining this world if you wish for it, @.$9#$b#As long as you are determined to try, I too am determined to make sure you succeed.$5#$b#There is no one that has captured my heart as you have in a very long time.$3#$b#I will not let our love slip through my fingers like I have done with so many other important things in this long life of mine.$5#$b#If it comes down to arguing for our case in front of the Ministry, I have no qualms about doing so.$3#$b#I could even finally make use of the many favors owed to me.$9#$b#After all, what is the use of working tirelessly for centuries if it does not even afford me the influence and respect to openly love someone as brilliant as you?$1"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/speak Wizard "It was originally my hope that you would not know of these hardships and smoothly enter the magical world none the wiser, but you are right.$3#$b#We are in this together.$1#$b#It is not right to exclude you from the conversation based off my own judgements.$2#$b#I hope you are able to forgive me, @.$2#$b# I will do my best to make sure you remain aware of the situation from now on.$9"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 400/playSound pickUpItem/positionOffset farmer -11 5/showframe Wizard 28/showframe farmer 101/pause 1500/showframe Wizard 32/positionOffset farmer 0 -5/showframe farmer 89/pause 300/emote farmer 20 true/emote Wizard 20/pause 400/speak Wizard "...@.$4"/pause 400/emote farmer 56/pause 500/speak Wizard "As long as we share the same feelings, I will make sure that we remain together.$6#$b#That is my vow to you, @.$4"/pause 400/playSound pickUpItem/positionOffset farmer 0 5/showframe Wizard 28/showframe farmer 101/pause 500/emote farmer 20 true/emote Wizard 20/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogue Wizard "I didn't want to leave you a grim impression so I'll share with you another fact.$1#$b#The most common source of new practitioners registered to the Ministry is childhood induction, but the second?#$b#Magic spouses.$6#$e#Ah, Welwick?#$b#Worry not, she'll keep our little secret until we are ready.$3#$b#It was impossible to hide from her to begin with, considering her talent in scrying.$3#$b#I should prepare her a thank you gift the next time we meet.$1#$e#Iona from the market last night was quite understanding as well.$3#$b#It's likely she too saw your potential and thus was willing to overlook our little tryst for the sake of giving you time to develop.$9#$b#...Or I cast that pitiful of an impression that she's simply relieved I will no longer lament over my ex-wife as much if we stay together without scrutiny.$3#$e#Whatever the case, I'm not complaining.$1"

to vent to without repercussions.$16"/pause 300/emote farmer 60/pause 500/speak Wizard "It has been over two decades, but I still remember that night. $25#$b#The man she loved desperately had committed an injustice towards her and she came to me for support during their fallout.$17#$b#Perhaps, she was feeling vengeful...$17#$b#...or it was a mere moment of weakness...$16#$b#No matter what the logic, that day we went beyond the comforts of a friend.$16#$b#We did not even reach dawn before she regretted everything, her tears shattering my hopes as the delusions they truly were.$16#$b#Later, I learned that she had married that man...$17#$b# ...and birthed a child.$17#$b#Yes, it was Abigail.$16"/pause 500/emote farmer 40/pause 600/speak Wizard "No matter how resentful of Caroline I may be, I cannot escape my role in Abigail's conception, @.$16#$b#In all likelihood I am her biological father.$17#$b#...There is nothing anyone can do that would alter that truth.$17#$b#For how much I longed to be a father, I never intended it like this, @.$16#$b#To have the child I desperately wanted kept from me, the two of us barely aware of each other's existences...$19#$b#...All because someone decided to weaponize my desperation for her petty revenge!$25#$b#It is strange I was not broken by the fact...$16#$b#...Or maybe I have already been broken for a long time...$17"/pause 500/stopMusic/emote farmer 40/pause 500/speak Wizard "There is no need to hold back your opinions, @.$17#$b#I would not tell you this story if I did not think you needed to know of it.$19#$b#I'm sure it's hardly what you expected to hear after such a beautiful night engulfed in love and passion...$16#$b#But you deserve the truth, @.$17#$b#I owe you that much as someone who desperately clings to your affections.$16"/pause 400/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/playMusic sweet/playSound pickUpItem/positionOffset farmer 0 5/showframe farmer 101/showframe Wizard 28/pause 2000/faceDirection farmer 3 true/faceDirection Wizard 1 true/positionOffset farmer 0 -5/pause 500/speak Wizard "@...$22"/pause 500/emote farmer 56/pause 400/speak Wizard "Yes, you are right. That was over twenty years ago.$20#$b#How could I have possibly compared you to Caroline after all you have done to express your love and care of me?$20#$b#Still, it is an important conversation to have, no?$23#$b#Least you be caught unaware of the timebomb brewing under the surface...$17#$b#I love you from the bottom of my heart, @.$20#$b#No matter what fallout, I'm sure we will be able to overcome it as long as we are together.$18#$b#After all, you asked me to believe in you, did you not?$20#$b#And look at where we are now.$18"/pause 400/emote Wizard 20 true/emote farmer 20/pause 800/playSound pickUpItem/showframe Wizard 28/showframe farmer 101/positionOffset farmer 0 5/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1500/speak Wizard "Shall we begin getting dressed...$15#$b#...Or would you like to extend last night's activities a little longer...?$18#$b#I long to see more of this side of you, @.$20#$b#How captivating you are with that flush dusting your skin...$18"/pause 1500/message "...Magnus and I spent the early morning indulging in our love..."/pause 500/message "In the end, he convinced me to let him teleport me home for the sake of the farm..."/end dialogue Wizard "...Come to visit again so soon?$6#$b#Is someone becoming a little too enthusiastic after finally getting a taste, hmm?$4#$e#Jests aside, please let me know if you would like an elixir or something similar.$3#$b#I suspect we may have both overexerted ourselves a little this morning.$4#$e#As for the Abigail situation...$3#$b#I've noticed her budding interest in the occult and combat, but the Ministry never contacted me about observing her, so it likely isn't a significant talent like yours.$3#$b#I suspect she is more suitable for taking up the mantle of an adventurer than a witch, but she is likely still my daughter nonetheless.$5#$b#I wish the best for her.$2#$b#I will keep observing her as I have for the rest of the town for now.$3#$b#Caroline may not be above petty revenge, but I am much too old to partake in anything similar.$3#$e#Make no mistake, @. The truth will let itself be known if that is what it truly necessary.$3#$b#I simply wish that the fallout will not reach far enough to concern you.$9 "

Their name is Morgan.$0#$b#I would have preferred to teach you magic full time...$3#$b#But having a point of reference for my teaching method would make it easier on you.#1#$b#Morgan will arrive tomorrow.$3"/pause 500/end dialogue Wizard "Morgan's family made the request to visit once a season, but I denied it.$3#$e#Allow me to explain.$3#$b#Official mages take an oath to follow the 'Merlin Doctrine'.$3#$b#The Ministry of Magic has the final say in all things and their policies towards inducting children from non-magical households is particularly strict.$3#$b#This was not originally the case, but more often than not magically inclined children are taken advantage of by their caregivers or other similar figures from their mundane lives.$3#$b#Good parents definitely exist, but far too much tragedy has ocurred before the Ministry finally stepped in and changed their stance.$3#$b#Better the pain of an early seperation than the dangers of a mage out of control.$2#$b#It's my duty to ensure they recieve a proper education and at least one safe parental figure to turn to in the future.$1#$e#Now, I must prepare their reading material.$1#$b#I admit,I'm somewhat excited.$1#$b# I've never had an official pupil before.$1#$e#As my partner, it's up to you whether or not you wish to support the child as well, but I would definitely welcome the reassurance and help.$9#$b#Consider it a work in progress template for our own children if they wish to pursue magic.$4#$e#What exactly is the 'Merlin Doctrine'?#$b#To explain it in the simplist of terms, it's an oath that we will not exploit our powers for excessive personal gain and to maintain balance with both nature and the mundane.$3#$b#There are also clauses that relate to mortal connections and the rules we must abide for the sake of peaceful co-existence without exploitation from either side.$3#$b#You are only required to take the oath after becoming a formal apprentice or upon being granted the title of magician after registering with the Ministry.$3#$e#Why haven't you been asked to take it?$0#$b#To be frank, your situation is somewhat special.$3#$b#Not only do you hold explosive latent magical potential, the lines of fate intersecting yours are particularly dense.$3#$b#The Ministry wants to avoid distorting those paths as much as possible, hence their decision to leave you to your own devices... for now at least.$3#$b#The Adventurer's Guild and the Order it attaches to hold no such principles, thus your quick intiation.#$b#Make no mistake, @. You will be asked to take the oath eventually, but only after the majority of those fate lines have been resolved over the next century or so.$3#$b#Until then, I'm to act as your guarantor and guide to this world.$1#$e#Frankly, I was originally somewhat annoyed about having to look after a mortal for so long to make sure she didn't cause too many issues.$3#$b#If I'd known we'd eventually wed, I would have jumped at the opportunity the moment you entered the valley.$4#$e#How long has the Ministry been observing you?#$b#As far as I'm aware of, it begin around the time you left Zuzu city.$3#$b#A high up member with the gift of determination felt the sudden shifting of countless fates converging onto a single person, namely you, @.#$b#I don't fault them for their caution. Entries.wizardEnchantedGrove: My Nexus is a bit old-fashioned, but I prefer it that way.$0#$b#I believe your Nexus is suited for 7 warp points, which is more than what mine has.$3#$b#You should consider what locations you would like to connect to around the valley.$9
Entries.WizardWaiting: I await your decision, @.$3#$e#I hope it is the correct one, no matter what it may be.$2

Entries.PeaceWithShadowPeople: I sense the shadow people are now at ease.$0#$e#Something has happened...$3#$e#Ah, it was your doing, @? Entries.winter_Tue8: I can't believe we became friends with the shadow people because of you, @!$3#$e#You're amazing.$3

Entries.spring_Sat10: Marlon told me that you actually managed to slay some sort of giant void serpant near Castle Village?$5#$b#I didn't know you were so strong, @!$1#$e#Sorry I said you weren't cool before.$8

Entries.funLeave_Wizard: {{Random: I must enter the tower today. Do not hesitate to contact me through the spirits if you require assistance.$3#$b#How? Simply call for me and I shall appear.$1#$b#See you, my love.$6 @@ Are you taking breaks properly?$3#$b#The last bit of news I wish to discover after returning from the tower is that you've collapsed from pushing yourself too hard.$5#$b#I'm aware you know your limits, @, but I still worry.$2 @@ I've been considering postponing my trips to the tower until you've given birth.$3#$b#You are more important than any research I could conduct, @.$9#$e# ...You'll be alright on your own...?$2#$b#If you insist, my love...$2 @@ You don't have to come visit me at the tower.$3#$b#My heart skips a beat every time you open that door, but I would loathe to put additional strain on your body.$2 @@ I will return in several hours.$3#$b#Please take it easy until then. I love you, @.$4 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.funReturn_Wizard: {{Random:Sadly, I haven't made any progress on finding a solution to the difficulties surrounding childbirth, but it is a relief to see your face, nonetheless.$4 @@ @! It's great to see you safe and sound, my heart.$6#$b#I worry about you constantly when I am at the tower, but I must complete this research for your sake.$5#$b#If anything were to happen to you and the little one...$2 @@I admit it. I cast more than a dozen scrying spells on you today.$3#$b#It seems that I cannot focus unless I have you in my sights.$2#$b#I'll try to restrain myself, but if you feel as if someone is watching you, it is likely me.$3 @@ I inquired Camilla about improvements to my protective charms.$3#$b#She had less than constructive advice, but I managed to fish a new ward from her notes.$9#$e#Anything you keep you and the little one safe, @.$1@@ Today's research... hasn't been very fruitful, sadly. $2#$b#I will try again.$5#$b#We still have time left.$3 @@ Do I smell strange?#$b#Apologies, my love. I was experimenting with the several potions in preparation.$3 @@ Camilla asked of you and offered to come 'assist' on authority of also being a woman.$3#$b#I denyed her outright.$5#$e# I'm willing to tolerate a lot of her 'jokes', but not while you are in such a delicate state.$3 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_0: {{Random:I've been researching tonics and elixirs relating to child birth.#$b#It would appear to be more complex topic than I anticipated, but I have found several promising leads.$3 @@ Make sure to tell me immediately if you feel... strange in any way.$3#$b# Pregnancies with magically inclined children are often marked by difficulty and hardship.$2#$b#How do I know our child will be magically inclined?#$b#Look at who their parents are!$9|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: {{Random:Have you begun considering names?$3#$b#I admit it is a field I am rather lacking in.$2 @@ I find myself plagued with more anxiety than joy most days.$3#$b#It had never occurred to me just truly how dangerous bringing a child into this world was.$3#$e#If there is one reason why I'm thankful for our meeting late into this near eternal life of mine, it would be today's medical capablities.$1 @@ Have you been speaking with the other mothers in the village?$3#$b#What are their thoughts on your pregnancy?$3#$e#These days I find that mundane resources are often more helpful on the topic like this one than ancient text.$2 |inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: {{Random:Our child will be fortunate to grow up surrounded by nature.$1#$b#Perhaps we should introduce them to magic early?$3#$b#The spirits will delight at the coming of such a bright spark.$6 @@ The full moon draws near.$3#$b#Tell me if the swelling of our child's magic bothers you.$3#$b#I'm told that mothers of magically inclined children often go through quite the ordeal.$2|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: {{Random:I find myself pondering our relationship with the towns people as of late.$3#$b#Will they accept our child with open arms as they have you?$3#$b#I don't have a very good track record in sociability.$2 @@ Do I still have those dreams of the children I never had?$3#$b#Occasionally, yes, but they now bid me good luck when I dream of them.$3#$b#Perhaps, it's a sign of finally letting go of the past.$9#$b#We will see.$6|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: {{Random:It appears the elements are already inquiring about your state.$1#$b#They can sense the buzz of your aura as the little one grows.$6 @@ How have you been sleeping?$2#$b#I hope the little one hasn't been disruptive of your rest.$2|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: {{Random:It is fortunate that I am already inclined towards the later hours.$3#$b#I will be able to care for our child while you rest without too much distruption.$9 @@ Lean against me and close your eyes if you're tired.$6#$b#I'll carry you to bed if you fall asleep.$4|inputSeparator=@@}}
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: {{Random:The night coos at our successful union.$1#$b#Do you feel it? How the magic swells under your flesh?$4#$b#Perhaps fate has more in store for us than I originally expected.$4 @@ I recently did some reading on the development of children.$3#$b#I am nowhere near as knowledgable as one specialized in birth and childcare, but please ask me if you have any questions.$3 @@ Oh! Entries.Indoor_Day_0: What are your plans today, my love?$3#$b#...Might I convince you to stay home and within my sights?$1#$e#...I didn't think so.$2
Entries.Indoor_Day_1: ...The children have begun asking me if something is wrong.$2#$b#I do not know what to say to them, my love.$2
Entries.Indoor_Day_2: Nngh...$10#$b#Forgive me. I expended too much mana on an experimental spell yesterday.$3#$e#I do not mind the mana expenditure itself, but the decreased productivity today is taking a toll on progress.$29
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I love you, @.$3#$e#Sorry, was that sudden?$2#$b#I felt like it was something I had to say considering our lack of outtings recently.$3#$b#I promise to make it up to you once this all resolved.$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_4: ...I look tired?$3#$b#...Indeed I have had several late nights recently, but it's for a good cause, my love.$2#$e#Do not worry, I will be fine.$3#$b#I have done far worse to myself in the time I was living alone.$29
Entries.Indoor_Night_Wizard: How was your day, my love? Fruitful I hope.$2#$b#Mine has been less than ideal, but I am allowing myself a moment of rest before I try again.$29#$e#...Do you mind if I hold you for a moment, @?$2#$b#I just...$29#$e#%I wrap my arms around Magnus and hold him tight.#$b#Thank you, my love.$2#$b#You do not know how much that means.$29
Entries.Indoor_Night_0: I am glad you are back, my love.$2#$b#Come into my arms if you have nothing else planned.$3#$b#Feeling your aura so close by will help ease my nerves a little.$29
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: Go ahead and sleep whenever you feel the urge, my love.$3#$b#I will be several hours longer. This report must be returned tomorrow morning.$29
Entries.Indoor_Night_2: ...Am I going too far, @?$10#$b#Camilla seems to think so.$11#$b#She says I'm being paranoid and that all I'll accomplish is scaring you.$11#$e#...That's not true is it?$2
Entries.Indoor_Night_3: Please come here and hold me for a moment, my love. I am in need of your calming presence.$2#$e#I feel as if I will go blind if I read another report tonight.$3#$b#...Yet presist, I must.$29
Entries.Indoor_Night_4: I have leaned somewhat on the Order for their assistance considering my longstanding connection with them, but it seems anyone useful is already registered with the Ministry.$3#$b#They may be able to assist in pulling a few more favours, however.$3
Entries.Rainy_Day_0: The sound of the rain hitting the roof has been assisting in helping me to keep my focus.$3#$e#I need all the help I can get.$2
Entries.Rainy_Day_1: Are you tired, @?$2#$b#I can't imagine my late nights are doing wonders for your sleep either.$2#$b#Come and lean on me if you need to take a break. I will be here reading more material.$29
Entries.Rainy_Day_2: With the abundant energies about, I attempted to scry an answer to the seal and our opponent.$3#$b#Sadly, that too has been obscured.$3#$b#We are facing against someone extremely formidable, my love.$29
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: The weather has made it difficult to gain access to certain reference material.$3#$b#Even after being reinforced by magic, books dating back over a thousand years ago are fragile.$2
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: Have you felt anything strange lately?$3#$b#Hmmm... $3#$b#Please let me know if you notice any changes within the 'strangeness'. It could provide clue.$3
Entries.Rainy_Night_0: Come here for a moment, @.$3#$b#Hmmm... There doesn't appear to be a reaction.$2#$e#...At least I was able to eliminate a possibility off the list.#29
Entries.Rainy_Night_1: ...Why did this have to happen?$29#$b#Is it due to your fate lines...?$29#$b#Could this have been avoided if we'd never...$29#$e#...$29#$e#%Magnus is looking at me with a sad look in his eyes.
Entries.Rainy_Night_2: ...If you were forced to choose, what would you pick, @?$29#$b#This life or.... your life?$26#$e#...Ah, that wasn't a fair question, was it?$2#$b#Please ignore it.$29
Entries.Rainy_Night_3: Never have I felt so frustrated by the limitations of being human as I am now.$3#$b#I have lived a thousand years and can subsist on nothing but energies alone! Why do I still require sleep!?$10
Entries.Rainy_Night_4: I see the rains have blessed your hair once again.$2#$b#I would dry you with a spell if I had energies to spare, but unfortunately I must devote it completely to spell trials.$29#$e#...If you are need of warming, however, I am happy to read documents while you rest within my arms.$9
Entries.Outdoor_0: I will be communing with the astral plane to see if there are answers to be found via another source.$3#$b#Wish me luck.$2
Entries.Outdoor_1: I am taking a brief moment to gather more mana before I return to spell trials.$3#$b#Please go about your work as usual. Seeing you in high spirits working around the fields soothes my anxiety somewhat.$3
Entries.Outdoor_2: I'm glad to see recent events hasn't impacted your work too much.#$b#Only one of us should have to struggle.$2
Entries.Outdoor_3: ...I have spent many years reinforcing and inspecting various barriers and seals, but never did I expect I would need to consider how to break them.$29#$b#Perhaps adventurers would be more knowledgable in such a field.#3
Entries.Outdoor_4: I will never abandon you, @.$5#$b#Even if it spells my end, as long as you are safe then I am content.$2#$b#...Always remember that.$29
Entries.spouseRoom_Wizard: ...No, that's not it.$10#$b#Where did I put that blasted book!?$11#$e#Forgive me, my love. I am rather frustrated at the moment.$3#$b#I managed to negotiate a deal where I am to trade a specific edition of a book for assistance in gaining access to some research notes.$3#$b#They would assist greatly in distinguishing between types of seals.$3#$e#...Now if I can locate where I put it...$29
Entries.patio_Wizard: I am consoldating as much mana as I can for my experiments tonight.$3#$e#It is one thing to read about a spell, it is another entirely to recreate it.$29#$b#My hope is that it will bring me one step closer to understanding the seal.$3#$b#If not...$29#$e#....$29
Entries.spring_8: How are you fairing, @?$2#$b#I know I have been preoccupied with researching and thus haven't been able to spend much quality time with you as of late.$2#$b#I will make it up to you once this is all over, my love.$3#$b#I promise.$5
Entries.spring_12: Ah, today is barrier inspection day.$3#$b#Unfortunately, we will have to forgo the lesson.$2#$b#I simply do not have the time nor spare mana to guide you while neck deep in research.$29#$b#Let us make it up next season, my love.$2
Entries.spring_13: ...Egg festival?$29#$b#Ah, yes, that was today.$3#$e#I doubt you will find trouble in such a large crowd, but I will attend just in case.$3
Entries.spring_15: Camilla will be visiting with important documents today.$3#$b#We have postponed our other discussions for favour of making sure your seal is resolved first.$3#$e#I would welcome you to visit as well.$3#$b#Being able to reference back to the magic we are attempting to deconstruct is always useful.$3
Entries.spring_23: I feel the scope of the search finally narrowing.$29#$b#It is my hope that I will have a concrete solution soon, @.$2#$b#I do not think either one of us wishes to drag this out much longer.$29
Entries.spring_24: ...Ah, today is the dance, isn't it?$29#$b#I...$3#$b#Let me think on it.$26#$e#...Please do not dance with someone else.$2

Entries.SummitEvent_Dialogue3_Wizard: I was certain my seemingly endless life had reached its final act.$3#$b#From grief to determination, from frustration to struggle, from numbness to denial, from tragedy to isolation...$3#$b#I was lost for a very long time.$2#$b#Perhaps I had lost myself when my mother fell ill all those years ago...$3#$b#...Yet, you found me, @.$6#$b#You came through the woods to knock on my door, your eyes filled with curiousity...$3#$b#...again...$9#$b#...and again...$1#$b#...and again....$6"/pause 200/speak Wizard "I had spent those days wondering how this would end.$2#$b#How you would break me further as both my ex-wife and Caroline had done before you after they had obtained what they truly wanted.$3#$b#But I was wrong, @.$6#$b#What you were after was not a powerful wizard nor someone to use to your advantage in revenge.$3#$b#What you wanted was me and nothing more.$6#$b#You cared nothing for my fear, my isolation, my guilt, shattering them as you pleased to reach the broken man hidden within you so sincerely wanted to know.$9#$b# You brought me, hope, @.$3#$b#Not only in the future, but myself as well.$9"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 300/speak Wizard "Thank you for trusting me.$1#$b#For believing in me.$6#$b# ...For giving me a chance at living again.$9#$b#I can only do my best to return it.$4#$b#Be it a thousand years or ten! Let us live forever immersed in our love, @!$6
